definition: one or two/a few
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
two/2/(Beijing dialect) stupid
slight knowledge of sth/to know very little about a subject/a smattering
Shanghai Incident of 28th January 1932, Chinese uprising against Japanese quarters of Shanghai
12th April/refers to Chiang Kai-shek's coup of 12th April 1927 against the communists in Shanghai
the coup of 12th Mar 1927, an attempt by Chiang Kai-shek to suppress the communists/called 反革命政變|反革命政变 or 慘案|惨案 in PRC literature
counterrevolutionary coup of 12th April 1927, Chiang Kai-shek's coup against the communists in Shanghai
pinyin: si4 yi1 er4 fan3 ge2 ming4 zheng4 bian4

definition: the massacre of 12th Mar 1927/the Shanghai coup of 12th Mar 1927 by Chiang Kai-shek against the communists

sentences.english: Unitary such good quality and small shop there, please, furniture 12, European style.
sentences.chinese: 幺等良品，小铺有请，家俱一二，欧陆风情。

sentences.english: Although they are plays on words, the scholars can choose one or two of them.
sentences.chinese: 虽为游戏笔墨，但治学者或当有一二可取者耳。

sentences.english: Let me think about that for a decade or two.
sentences.chinese: 对于这个问题，让我再考虑一二十年吧。

sentences.english: Until I was eleven or twelve, she had long dark wavy hair.
sentences.chinese: 我十一二岁前，母亲总是留着长长的鬈发。

sentences.english: Within the next decade or two, one to two billion people on the planet will be netted together.
sentences.chinese: 一二十年之内，全球将有一二十亿人互联。

sentences.english: They were often compelled to work eleven or twelve hours a day.
sentences.chinese: 他们常常被迫每天工作十一二个小时。

sentences.english: Tolstoy became a kind of prophet in his old age, during the last few decades.
sentences.chinese: 晚年，在其辞世前的一二十年，托尔斯泰象个传道者。

sentences.english: We know other things about their lives as well.
sentences.chinese: 我们还对他们生活的其他方面略知一二。

sentences.english: Residents planted flowers and trees including pine and cypress in the yards.
sentences.chinese: 每座房子都是一二层高，院子里栽有花草和松柏等。

sentences.english: Here is the second nitrogen, one, two, three, four, five.
sentences.chinese: 这是第二个氮，一二三四五。

sentences.english: The deposits of Mine No. 712 belong to the moderately inclined ones.
sentences.chinese: 七一二矿属缓倾斜铀矿床。

sentences.english: To find out let's fast-forward a decade or two.
sentences.chinese: 为了找出答案让我们快速向前走一二十年。

sentences.english: After Japan enkindled flames of war on January 28th in Shanghai, this inclination was shown more distinctively.
sentences.chinese: 一二八战火点燃后，这种倾向更鲜明地表露出来。

sentences.english: A:Are you interested in any other units besides unit 212?
sentences.chinese: 除了二一二单位，你们对其他单位有没有兴趣？

sentences.english: I lived in Yokohama two summers ago, so I know a little about it.
sentences.chinese: 我两年前的夏天在横滨住过，所以我略知一二。

sentences.english: He had by now an inkling of the factors involved.
sentences.chinese: 他总算对涉及到的各种因素略知一二了。

definition: slight knowledge of sth/to know very little about a subject/a smattering
to peep/to pry into
variant of 窺|窥[kui1]
to find out about/to discover
therein/in this
untalented/I/me (humble)
to point out/to indicate/to give directions/to show how (to do sth)/to censure/to pick at
under/myself (humble)
the full picture (i.e. the whole situation)/panorama
(pron) everyone/Ladies and Gentlemen/Sirs
(quite) a lot/many
lit. to see a leopard through a narrow tube (idiom); fig. to miss the big picture
boundary/clue/indication/to obtain clues/to infer
lit. one scale and half a claw (idiom); only odd bits and pieces
the younger generation/those who come after
to say clearly/to argue clearly/to pronounce/pronounced
it may be assumed that
